page.title: 20Tebay School End of Term
page.content: July 1 Went to Appleby for the visit of{Princess Anne. July 4 Library Van's termly visit & reports given out. July 10 Open Day. July 11 Morning assembly in the Methodist Chapel & infants went to the local play group. July 12 End of term service in St James Church.Police showed film in the afternoon 'Never go with Strangers'. July 15 School sports {if wet on July {16. Swimming Gala at Appleby pool. July 17 End of Term. Other events included:- Cycling Proficieny Course with 12 children;infants went to Appleby Castle;4 4th Year children visited their secondary school; THE END
